author: advaitasaha
content:
nimbus-eth1 does have experimental support using `--history-expiry=true` and you can mention block height using `--debug-history-expiry-limit=<blockNumber>`
Though this works only for sepolia and mainnet, but we can extend the support for custom networks

author: gtrintinalia
content: Besu also has the flag `--Xsnapsync-synchronizer-pre-merge-headers-only-enabled=true` and block height can be set in the genesis file
